description: This file is a shell script used for configuring GRE tunnels, setting up network interfaces, and managing system events related to hotspot and GRE tunnel configuration.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events for snooper logs.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial configuration parameters from PSM database.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates and configures GRE tunnel interfaces and associated network settings.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events related to hotspot keep-alive settings.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures iptables rules for network traffic filtering.
